name: Wang Ding
title: Robotics Engineering Student
bio: I am an undergraduate student (Class of 2024) at the Xu Teli College, Beijing Institute of Technology, majoring in Robotics Engineering (Li Zexiang Innovation Class). I am passionate about embodied AI, robot manipulation, and contributing to the open-source community.

education.field: "Li Zexiang Innovation and Entrepreneurship Class" (Robotics Engineering)
